currency_regulations.general_description: Regulations governing the movement of cash, foreign currency, and securities across Swiss borders, with disclosure requirements for amounts exceeding CHF 10,000.

illegal.description: Currency-related activities that are completely prohibited and subject to criminal penalties

items.description: Using cash movements to conceal the origins of illegally obtained funds
items.reason: Criminal activity under anti-money laundering laws

items.description: Moving cash for the purpose of financing terrorist activities
items.reason: Criminal activity under anti-terrorism financing laws

items.description: Giving false information about cash amounts, origin, purpose, or beneficiary when questioned by FOCBS
Refusing to answer questions about cash when questioned by FOCBS staff during checks
items.reason: Administrative offense - cooperation required during official checks

restricted.description: Currency movements subject to disclosure requirements or special conditions

items.description: Carrying CHF 10,000 or more in cash, foreign currency, or securities
items.conditions: Information registered in FOCBS system when amount equals or exceeds CHF 10,000

items.description: Cash movements that raise suspicion during FOCBS checks regardless of amount
requirements: Must provide truthful information when questioned
items.conditions: Subject to investigation if suspicious activity detected

items.description: Cash movements subject to questioning during FOCBS checks
requirements: Must provide truthful responses when questioned
items.conditions: Obligation to provide information when directly questioned by FOCBS staff

legal.description: Currency movements allowed with minimal restrictions

items.description: Foreign currency and securities carried into, through, and out of Switzerland
Shares, bonds, and cheques carried across borders
Cash movements for legal purposes with proper documentation
requirements: Ability to demonstrate legal origin and purpose if questioned

important_notes.no_declaration_requirement: No obligation to proactively declare cash to FOCBS
important_notes.truthful_disclosure_obligation: Must provide truthful information when questioned by FOCBS staff
important_notes.registration_threshold: CHF 10,000 or equivalent triggers registration in FOCBS information system
important_notes.administrative_offense: Refusal to provide information or false information constitutes administrative offense with fines
important_notes.criminal_consequences: Suspected money laundering or terrorist financing leads to seizure and police handover
important_notes.other_countries: Different regulations apply in other countries - contact foreign authorities directly
important_notes.focbs_authority: Federal Office for Customs and Border Security (FOCBS) has authority to question and investigate
